snippet.title: BIG SHOTS VR - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Gear up, team up, and exterminate! Become the ultimate mech pilot in BIG SHOTSⓇ, the action-packed VR roguelite where you’ll battle alien hordes, earn upgrades, and forge an unstoppable mech to reclaim Earth.

Available Q1, 2024. Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2666530/BIG_SHOTS/

Join our community on Discord: https://discord.gg/YqWQPxcQfu
Together, we'll reclaim Earth from the alien intruders!
